document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2021-03
document.heading: AN INTERIM URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA ENACTED PURSUANT TO CALIFORNIA GOVERNMENT CODE SECTION 65858 ESTABLISHING A 10-MONTH, 15-DAY TEMPORARY MORATORIUM ON THE APPROVAL OF DISCRETIONARY APPLICATIONS FOR NEW FUEL STATIONS THAT ARE NOT COMPLETE AS OF THE EFFECTIVE DATE OF THE ORDINANCE IN ALL ZONING DISTRICTS IN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON PENDING REVIEW AND POSSIBLE AMENDMENT OF MUNICIPAL CODE REGULATIONS; AND SETTING FORTH THE FACTS CONSTITUTING SUCH URGENCY
